metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3598

Platform: SUSE Enterprise Storage 7.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 15 SP3

metadata.Description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in extractContigSamplesShifted24bits in tools/tiffcrop.c:3604, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit cfbb883b.
